EmailTemplate.subject: Partnering with Teladoc Health in 2022
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
WEBINAR Simplifying the selling experience and bringing enhanced solutions your clients need Livongo BG300 being used in kitchen We’re sorry you missed our recent webinar. The good news is that we recorded the presentation and have it available for you to access anytime! Feel free to watch, share and let us know if you have any additional questions about our virtual care solutions. Watch the webinar <[[https://view.highspot.com/viewer/622fa16059f6bc8d835bf886]]> Watch our on-demand webinar to: Learn about new contract path opportunities to streamline Teladoc Health products & services Discover our current offerings for small employers and exciting enhancements for 2022 See a demo of our chronic care solutions
About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
